contents.text: Thank you for calling Design Action Collective in the East Bay, specializing in graphic design and visual communications for progressive non-profit and social change organizations.
For new client inquiries and project proposals, press '1'.
To learn about our graphic design and visual communication services, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a team member who can discuss our services.

navigationGoals: Learn about their graphic design and visual communication offerings
I want to learn about your graphic design services for creating a veterans outreach flyer.
I’d like an overview of your visual communication and branding design capabilities for our nonprofit’s digital campaign.
I’d like someone to explain your graphic design and visual communication services to me.
I’d like an overview of your graphic design and visual communication services for my student-led science outreach project.

contents.text: To submit a new project proposal or request a quote, press '2'.
Please hold while we forward your call to our proposals coordinator.

navigationGoals: Request a quote for a new project proposal
I’d like to request a quote for a logo and website redesign for my veteran support nonprofit.
I want to submit a project brief for a website UI redesign and get an initial cost estimate and timeline.
I want to request a quote for a new design project.
I want to submit a proposal and get a quote for designing a poster for our upcoming physics seminar.

contents.text: For existing clients and ongoing project support, press '2'.
To check the status of an ongoing project, press '1'.
Please hold while we retrieve your project details and connect you.

navigationGoals: Check the current status of my ongoing design project
I need an update on the brochure design project I have with you for my mentorship program.
I need a status update on the infographics deliverables and current project milestones.
I’m calling to check the progress on my ongoing design project.
Can you update me on the status of our current design for the departmental outreach brochure?

contents.text: To speak directly with your project manager, press '2'.
Please hold while we put you through to your project manager.

navigationGoals: Speak directly with my project manager for updates
I want to speak with my project manager about revisions to our event poster.
I’d like to connect with my project manager to review the latest mockup revisions and style guide updates.
I need to speak directly with the project manager handling my work.
I need to speak with my project manager about revising the conference banner design we’re working on.
